name: INVERTED LIGHT
description:
Darkness is slowly devouring the remnants of light on earth.

Pass this difficult test and bring the light back to earth.

A short action game made for Black and White Jam. 

Controls: 

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, and press the space bar to place torches.

Made by: 

Nickolay Zholudev   -   game idea,  code,  sfx;

breadbouul ( Maggie W )   -   Art,  animations,  design;

Ill   -   music,  sfx;
